Class TestAPI

All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class TestAPI
extends junit.framework.TestCase

Test the API, i.e. all the access methods of factories, etc. This test cases mainly throw null pointer exceptions if something goes wrong while calling the API with the parameters.

Author:
Markus Stocker
